title: Possible Evelynn VU
body: I personally really like this look for eve. It keeps it pretty classic yet its really beautiful. Maybe keep the heels though and loose the long spider fingers and i love everything else.

replies.body:
Fingers are a bit too long.
The hair is... unusual.
The clawed feet need to look more organic/natural or just get rid of the heel-claw.

I actually like this interpretation otherwise.

> [{quoted}](name=Jamnon,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=jT571mz2,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-04-07T00:22:26.095+0000)
>
> Fingers are a bit too long.
> The hair is... unusual.
> The clawed feet need to look more organic/natural or just get rid of the heel-claw.
> 
> I actually like this interpretation otherwise.

Yea Im not a huge fan of the fingers and i prefer the heels but for someone to run around in hooker stilettos on the shadow isle doesn't make sense XD. Maybe just give her a more sliming fit boot with a small heel. Other than that I like this art a lot. She seems more shadow isle like.
In all fairness she is wearing a hooker outfit practically :p

> [{quoted}](name=Jamnon,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=jT571mz2,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-04-07T04:31:11.140+0000)
>
> **In all fairness she is** ~~wearing~~ **a hooker** ~~outfit practically~~ :p

Why else would she wear what she wears except to help her in her job of assassination?
Its like you can read my mind.
;P
Looks amazing, but I would prefer she kept the heels.

I really am not a fan of this VU envisioning at all. She looks all kinds of wrong. She has bizzare looking Slenderman hands going on, and her clawed feet look like they belong on a dinosaur. The 'heel' thing on them also looks stupid as hell.

I much, much prefer the Evelynn we have today. In my opinion she doesn't even 'need' a Style Overhaul, but rather her current assets and animations just need to be upgraded a lot to look on par with everyone else.

The whole Eve VU thing is very disappointedly being 'over-thought' when she doesn't need a gigantic scrapping of her mysterious, sexy theme.
Why does every single Eve VU idea keep her giant pink hair??? That is literally the worst part of her current appearance and it doesn't do her any good to keep it.

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=jT571mz2,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-04-07T11:59:59.694+0000)
>
> Why does every single Eve VU idea keep her giant pink hair??? That is literally the worst part of her current appearance and it doesn't do her any good to keep it.

I think they did a marvelous job modernizing her hair in the Safecracker skin and would love to see that style on a new Eve VU. As for the imagining in the OP's image, I like most of this looks save for the hair and heels. It really tones down the grossly 80s/90s obsession with spikes, and it brings her to a place that's seductive, yet not a testosterone fueled wet dream for a female character. I do need the heels though. Eve without heels just isn't Eve. Her line "It takes a lot of effort to move like this in heels" is one of her most iconic lines, I feel.

Agreed, she needs to keep the heels (and in fact, walking in heels is not that hard for an athletic individual, because it is just like running on the balls of their feet, which is the healthiest and most natural way to run). I also dislike the third eye in the middle of her forehead, it is unnecessary and looks out of place. Her hands can be clawed like this art piece, but not so long and spidery.

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=jT571mz2,comment-id=000e00000000,timestamp=2015-04-07T13:50:10.924+0000)
>
> Agreed, she needs to keep the heels (and in fact, walking in heels is not that hard for an athletic individual, because it is just like running on the balls of their feet, which is the healthiest and most natural way to run). I also dislike the third eye in the middle of her forehead, it is unnecessary and looks out of place. Her hands can be clawed like this art piece, but not so long and spidery.

Actually current Evelynn has the weird third eye. I think it was added in her texture update.

Also, I think the line about moving in heels has more to do with being stealthy while wearing heels (they click!) and potentially wading though rough terrain and water in spiked shoes that would surely end up with a broken leg if she takes one wrong step on squishy ground.

Really... I'll have to check about that third eye thing, because I still think it is weird for no purpose but to be weird.

EDIT: Yeah, she has always had that mark, but it is certainly *not* another eye. It actually looks like a lunar tattoo similar to Diana's, only smaller.
I'm feeling more of this kind of update... I feel this suits her more.

> [{quoted}](name=Efauna,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=jT571mz2,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-04-07T04:31:13.491+0000)
>
> I'm feeling more of this kind of update... I feel this suits her more.

But that doesnt look anything like Eve. Theres literally no resemblance. It would just be a completely different haracter. If youre telling me that from this http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Evelynn_0.jpg is more suited then idk what to say....

> [{quoted}](name=Tsundere Queen,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=jT571mz2,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2015-04-07T04:37:06.532+0000)
>
> But that doesnt look anything like Eve. Theres literally no resemblance. It would just be a completely different haracter. If youre telling me that from this http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Evelynn_0.jpg is more suited then idk what to say....

Personally, I see a resemblance.. Not everyone is going to agree, I know. But I think she looks outdated. Troll-doll hair and the outfit. I love Eve and everything she seems to embody, such as that mysterious sexy assassin look she has going on. The artist that I posted who did his own rendition of Eve; I feel like it suits her. Sexy. Mysterious. Evelynn. And Riot has done re-works... Trundle... Scion..
Rito, plz

I really love this artwork, and I'm glad to see it posted again.

Personally, I prefer the clawed feet to heeled shoes, but I feel that the really long fingers / claws on her hands are a bit too much.
Evelynn's not a demon though.
we dont know what she is

well I don't want her to be anything in the form of a succubus when here evenutally VU comes...
She's already nerfed a million times :/
I like the way her tango skin looks, had it on her since its release.
Am i the only one who sees Nicki Minaj in this?
The general concept is really really cool! maybe some few tweaks like leaving the heels and stuff, but that is subjective, in general terms it looks great!

The hair looks less weird so....

 :D
Hideous feet

now that i think of it, what is evelynn ? she has pointy ears she has some seduction/vampiric theme, but it is unclear what she is actually. Same goes with janna, she isnt human, she has pointy ears as well. So what is she ? an elf ? why is she the only one ? where are the others ? is evelynn like a dark elf ? 

on a side note, there is some many different races in runeterra, and i feel like most of them are left unexplointed in the current state. like for example the ursa or w/e they are called, the volibear race. 

So many question, and i fear the answer is just that the champion concept team may overlook some of these races jsut to make mostly human and yordles, with only few exceptions there and there.
Uh, no thanks. Not digging the weird claws and foot spikes. Or the random ass third eye. Or the armor. But it's the parrot so the armor is a given I guess.
Very nice, but the feets looks strange on her.
i like her looking like a dyke to be honest
I "fixed" it with suggestions from comments, I just did this real quick but i think it looks closer to what I see as evelynn
I would play her every single day if she looked like this ;)

Somewhat like the clothes.
Don't like the nails.
Don't like the hair.
NO HEELS? WTF.

Haha I like it but also have to agree with heels. Feel like what ever riot does with eve...
I want them heels Rito!

Wait did you make this??? Because it's great!

Evelynn is sexy and dangerous. The clothing doesn't make her look slutty, but it outlines her curves and skinniness, and it looks pretty deceptive. Her hair actually looks normal. Its volums holds a lot of secrets, like Gretchen Wieners.
Yeah Eve kind of looks weird right now...
Love this it still holds what makes eve herself but is less domination looking. Great find!
